q: That brings us to the second problem with Chrome OS. It's going to be a tough sell. Eric Schmidt added to the spin via his blog, with a post a week after the delay: Welcome to the latest chapter of an epic journey in computing. Welcome to Chrome OS. Welcome to what, exactly? Google's promotional video for the Chrome OS doesn't do it any favours either. It's a video designed to illustrate just how resilient your cloud-stored data is when faced with adversity
